translation.en: It's not over.
Hey! Hey! This is not flag football! This is real football!
translation.es: ¡Oigan! ¡No es fútbol bandera! ¡Es fútbol americano de verdad!

translation.en: I'm fine! Stop worrying about me!
What about you?
What the hell are you doing out there?
What the hell are you doing, man?
Hey! Hey! Take a seat.
Not in front of them!
Don't look at the scoreboard. We're still alive! All right.
translation.es: No miren el marcador. ¡Seguimos con vida! Bien.

translation.en: Stop feeling sorry for yourselves.
translation.es: Basta de sentir lástima por ustedes mismos.

translation.en: We're down by two touchdowns.
They're doing better than we are, but that's fine!
translation.es: Juegan mejor, pero no pasa nada.

translation.en: We just need to man up!
If you see an opponent in front of you, tackle him and get him down!
translation.es: ¡Si tienen enfrente a un oponente, derríbenlo, tírenlo al piso!

translation.en: Quit being petty with them and letting them get into your heads.
translation.es: No discutan y no dejen que se les metan en la cabeza.

translation.en: That's their goal!
They're trying to get you mad.
That's their goal.
It's the second half. Focus on football, not them.
translation.es: Es el segundo tiempo. Estén atentos al fútbol, no a ellos.

translation.en: You have to be aggressive.
Now we gotta stay focused.
Go!
Hey! Hey! Amaree! Stop! Amaree! Stop it!
Why? Why? Take a breath. I need you the whole game.
translation.es: ¿Por qué? Respira. Te necesito todo el partido.

translation.en: When they talk trash to you, don't get in their face like that.
translation.es: Cuando te provoquen, no los enfrentes.

translation.en: Just be cool.
Go! Come on!
You can do better! We need you!
Hey, hey, hey, accept it. You need to accept what happened.
translation.es: Oye, acéptalo. Debes aceptar lo que pasó.

translation.en: You think I don't accept this? Screw you, man.
translation.es: ¿Crees que no lo acepto? Vete a la mierda.

translation.en: All right, okay. It's just one loss, man. It's nothing!
translation.es: Es solo una derrota. Una sola. ¡No pasa nada!

translation.en: Will I see you later?
It's our first loss of the season.
translation.es: Es nuestra primera derrota de la temporada.

translation.en: I know we're all upset.
Don't let the nerves get to you.
translation.es: No dejes que los nervios te afecten.

translation.en: We beat Texas last year, remember?
translation.es: El año pasado vencimos a Texas, ¿recuerdas?

translation.en: We had a long winning streak.
It's our senior year. We gotta finish strong.
translation.es: Es nuestro último año. Hay que terminar con todo.

translation.en: You M-A-M-M-A-S-B-O-Y.
I became deaf when I had meningitis.
I was born hearing.
And later, at two or three years old, I lost my hearing.
translation.es: Y luego, a los dos o tres años, perdí el oído.

translation.en: I was sick and close to dying, and I had a brain infection and swelling.
translation.es: Me enfermé y casi muero, y tuve infección e inflamación cerebral.

translation.en: I can't hear anything.
I can't hear cheering,
the fans yelling.
I feel their vibration.
I feel their footsteps when they run, the boom, boom, boom of the vibration.
translation.es: Siento los pasos cuando corren, el pum, pum, de la vibración.

translation.en: The cochlear implant, or CI,
gives you more ability to hear.
translation.es: te da más habilidad para escuchar.

translation.en: I have the cochlear implant,
and I only use it to listen to music, and that's it.
translation.es: y lo uso para escuchar música, nada más.

translation.en: I can feel the vibrations and I can hear the music,
translation.es: Puedo sentir las vibraciones y escuchar la música,

translation.en: but I don't hear the lyrics.
Music helps me stay focused and calm.
translation.es: La música me ayuda a concentrarme y calmarme.

translation.en: I'm not crazy into basketball. Honestly, football, that's my thing.
translation.es: No me enloquece el básquetbol. Prefiero el fútbol americano.

translation.en: You know what keeps me motivated? Working hard.
translation.es: A mí me motiva trabajar duro.

translation.en: That's why I don't like baseball.
translation.es: Por eso no me gusta el béisbol.

translation.en: You know I don't like that bullshit… Right.
translation.es: No me gusta esa mierda… Exacto.

translation.en: True, true.
You're dumb.
So, Lera, are you going to homecoming with Amaree or…?
translation.es: Lera, ¿irás al baile con Amaree o…?

translation.en: I'm not sure. We'll see how it goes.
translation.es: No estoy segura. Veremos cómo va todo.

translation.en: If things are good with us, then we might go together. We'll see.
translation.es: Si estamos bien, quizá sí. Ya veremos.

translation.en: Amaree said he didn't really wanna go, so we'll see about that.
translation.es: Amaree dijo que no quería ir, ya veremos qué dice.

translation.en: Football is one of the avenues for them
translation.es: El fútbol americano es la herramienta

translation.en: to show the world what we're made of.
translation.es: para mostrarle al mundo lo que valen.

translation.en: That's not the only way,
but it's one of the many great ways to put that on display.
translation.es: pero es una gran manera de mostrarlo.

translation.en: From here on out, we are seriously focused.
translation.es: Desde este momento, estamos concentrados en serio.

translation.en: Our goal is to win all the way to homecoming
translation.es: Nuestro objetivo es ganar todos los partidos de la liga

translation.en: and win that homecoming game.
With a Deaf team, because they don't hear,
translation.es: Con un equipo de sordos, al no oír,

translation.en: I believe their other senses are heightened.
translation.es: el resto de sentidos se agudizan.

translation.en: Our players have a better feel on the field,
translation.es: Nuestros jugadores sienten mejor el campo,

translation.en: and I believe they see things better because they can't hear.
translation.es: y creo que ven mejor porque no oyen.

translation.en: How do we communicate on the field?
We huddle up and shoot our plays out. We have a secret code.
translation.es: Decimos las jugadas. Tenemos un código.

translation.en: The drum is a very important part of cheering.
translation.es: El tambor es importante para los animadores.

translation.en: Yeah, we feel that vibration, and it's great.
translation.es: Sí, sentimos la vibración y es genial.

translation.en: No, no, watch. Follow me.
I'm the only Deaf person in my family.
translation.es: Soy el único sordo en mi familia.

translation.en: Yeah, I do feel lonely.
When I was a kid, they would just talk around me.
translation.es: De niño, todos hablaban a mi alrededor.

translation.en: And I didn't understand any of it, so I'd just go off on my own.
translation.es: Yo no entendía y me iba solo.

translation.en: When I run into hearing people out in the world,
translation.es: Cuando me encuentro con oyentes en el mundo,

translation.en: I feel, as a Deaf person, I am alone.
translation.es: siento que, como sordo, estoy solo.

translation.en: That's Dad?
Yes.
I was about two years old when my dad left.
translation.es: Tenía unos dos años cuando mi padre se fue.

translation.en: I do wonder why my dad left.
translation.es: Me pregunto por qué se fue.

translation.en: Is it because I'm Deaf? Maybe. I don't know.
translation.es: ¿Es porque soy sordo? Quizá. No lo sé.

translation.en: Very cute.
Teddy's gone. He was my best friend.
translation.es: Teddy ya no está. Era mi mejor amigo.

translation.en: Teddy was on our football team at Maryland School for the Deaf.
translation.es: Teddy estaba en el equipo de la Escuela para Sordos de Maryland.

translation.en: Jalen and Teddy, that was Jalen's first relationship.
translation.es: Jalen y Teddy, fue la primera relación de Jalen.

translation.en: Jalen's first love.
The reason I was attracted to Teddy is he was funny.
translation.es: Me sentí atraído por Teddy porque era gracioso.

translation.en: He always made me laugh.
Not only that, but we could have really good conversations.
translation.es: No solo eso, teníamos muy buenas conversaciones.

translation.en: We could talk about anything.
And then sophomore year, he transferred to a hearing school.
translation.es: En segundo año, lo transfirieron a una escuela de oyentes.

translation.en: They were asking him, "Hey, you're Deaf. What are you doing here?"
"You should go back to the Deaf school."
translation.es: Deberías volver a la escuela de sordos".

translation.en: He was being bullied because of his Deafness.
translation.es: Le hacían bullying debido a su sordera.

translation.en: And he was wearing hearing aids, and they would flick his hearing aid off.
translation.es: Él usaba audífonos, y se los apagaban.

translation.en: He just had so many issues going on.
His identity, his family, his friends… He was being bullied…
translation.es: Su identidad, su familia, sus amigos… Le hacían bullying…

translation.en: There were so many things going on, and it took a toll on him.
translation.es: Pasaban muchas cosas, y al final le afectó.

translation.en: Teddy hanged himself.
Teddy was our third adopted child.
translation.es: Teddy era nuestro tercer hijo adoptivo.

translation.en: Many of the people that were with him did not understand
translation.es: Muchas de las personas que estaban con él no entendían

translation.en: what he was dealing with,
but he was battling some demons.
And… not being able to console him
with sound was difficult.
I do feel as though there's some isolation that they must feel
translation.es: Siento que deben sentir una soledad muy grande

translation.en: when they're not with people who can communicate with them.
translation.es: cuando no están con gente que se comunica con ellos.

translation.en: Teddy was my close friend. We grew up together.
translation.es: Teddy era un amigo muy cercano. Crecimos juntos.

translation.en: When he killed himself, it was a huge shock to us.
translation.es: Cuando se suicidó, fue un gran golpe para todos.

translation.en: It had a really big impact on our community.
I felt like I wanted to hurt myself
translation.es: Sentía ganas de lastimarme a mí mismo

translation.en: because he was gone.
I wanted to hurt myself. I tried to cut myself.
I felt angry.
It was a mixture of anger, feeling upset, sadness.
translation.es: Era una mezcla de rabia, impotencia, tristeza.

translation.en: I feel that, now that he's gone,
translation.es: Siento que, ahora que no está,

translation.en: it's made it a little bit tougher.
He's gone, but Teddy's always going to have a special place in my heart.
translation.es: Ya no está, pero Teddy siempre tendrá un lugar especial en mi corazón.

translation.en: Discrimination is everywhere.
It's pretty much inevitable for them.
I think it's how we react to the discrimination.
translation.es: Creo que es cómo reaccionamos a la discriminación.

translation.en: Ready, ready…
A lot of the hearing teams don't want to play us.
translation.es: Muchos equipos de oyentes no quieren jugar contra nosotros.

translation.en: And most coaches don't like to lose to Deaf coaches.
translation.es: Y los entrenadores no quieren perder con entrenadores sordos.

translation.en: Out in the hearing world, they tend to look down on Deaf people,
translation.es: Los oyentes tienden a menospreciar a los sordos

translation.en: and they don't think we can do things as well.
translation.es: y no creen que podamos hacer las cosas tan bien como ellos.

translation.en: So the way to prove them wrong is to beat them,
translation.es: Para demostrar que se equivocan, debemos ganarles,

translation.en: to crush them on the field and teach them that Deaf people can do anything.
translation.es: aplastarlos y que vean que los sordos pueden hacer todo.

translation.en: And we prove to them that we are the same.
When Amaree was born, I was 25 years old.
translation.es: Cuando nació Amaree, yo tenía 25 años.

translation.en: I walked out because I was terrified at the time that he was sick.
translation.es: Me fui porque estaba aterrado cuando se enfermó.

translation.en: I didn't know what to expect.
I walked out on my family
immaturely, very foolishly
and later regretted it.
I sold heroin, and a lot of it.
And I got into a lot of trouble.
translation.es: Y me metí en muchos problemas.

translation.en: MORNING STAR BAPTIST CHURCH OF CHRIST
translation.es: IGLESIA BAUTISTA DE CRISTO LUCERO DEL ALBA

translation.en: God found his way back into my heart.
And that really-- My faith journey began my transition
translation.es: Mi viaje de fe fue el comienzo de mi transición

translation.en: away from a life in the streets, and…
translation.es: para alejarme de la vida en las calles.

translation.en: I decided that, whatever it would take
translation.es: Y decidí que haría cualquier cosa

translation.en: for me to heal our relationship
and be a part of his life, that's what I was willing to do.
translation.es: y ser parte de su vida.

translation.en: And it started slow.
Everything about being in his world is a learning experience, amen,
translation.es: Siempre que estoy en su mundo es una experiencia de aprendizaje, amén,

translation.en: because my son is Deaf.
Amen, and I watch him and his team,
translation.es: Amén. Y él y su equipo,

translation.en: with what should appear to be a decided disadvantage,
translation.es: con lo que parecería ser una desventaja clara,

translation.en: beat the mess out of people every time I go watch them play
translation.es: les dieron una paliza a los otros cada vez que los fui a ver

translation.en: over the course of the last three years.
They were on a 42-game win streak.
Do you know how many seasons it takes to accumulate a 42-game win streak?
translation.es: ¿Saben cuántas temporadas se necesitan para tener una racha de 42 partidos?

translation.en: And a team came up from Texas,
and something happened that was just completely unexpected.
My son's team got beat.
translation.es: Derrotaron al equipo de mi hijo.

translation.en: At the end of the game,
one of the players raised his hand, and he wanted to speak.
translation.es: uno de los jugadores levantó la mano, quería hablar.

translation.en: His number was 23. He stood up and he said,
translation.es: Llevaba el número 23. Se puso de pie y dijo:

translation.en: "This loss will not define us as a team."
translation.es: "Esta derrota no nos definirá como equipo".

translation.en: The reality of this life is that, while we are living,
translation.es: La realidad de la vida es que mientras vivimos

translation.en: we are going to face some adversity,
yet we must examine who we are
in the face of adversity.
It's not what we go through…
it's how we choose to go through it.
They gonna take you and think that you at a disadvantage,
when the reality of it is,
all you need to do is go suit up
and execute the plan for your life that God has for you.
translation.es: y llevar a cabo el plan de vida que Dios tiene para ti.

translation.en: I've watched these young people, week after week, as I go to these games.
translation.es: He visto a estos jóvenes cada semana, cuando voy a los partidos.

translation.en: They beat the starch out of people, and people never see it coming
translation.es: Derrotan a los equipos, y ellos no lo ven venir

translation.en: because, in a lot of cases, they think, "Just because…"
translation.es: porque en muchos casos piensan: "Solo porque…".

translation.en: Amen.
No matter how tough it gets,
translation.es: Sin importar lo duro que sea,

translation.en: we gotta continue to go hard
and continue to press,
and continue to fight.
I watched these young men battle to the last whistle.
translation.es: Vi a estos jóvenes luchar hasta el silbatazo final.

translation.en: They played until it was zeros left on the clock.
translation.es: Jugaron hasta que el reloj quedó en cero.

translation.en: And guess what I can tell you from the effort that I saw from them.
translation.es: Y si algo sé es que se esforzaron,

translation.en: They left it all on the field.
In the game, when we go to huddle, pay attention to the next play.
translation.es: Cuando nos agrupemos, presten atención a la siguiente jugada.

translation.en: Get in and get out.
So make sure you're looking at the play call,
translation.es: Asegúrense de ver la jugada que haremos,

translation.en: not messing around and talking to each other.
The important thing is, this is our last game.
translation.es: Lo que importa es que es nuestro último partido.

translation.en: I need 110% effort out there.
Work hard. We don't need any heroes out there.
Let's tackle it. And we'll get the win.
translation.es: Si les damos batalla, podremos ganar.

translation.en: That's all it takes. Not showin' off. No messin' around.
translation.es: Es eso. No quieran destacar. No hagan tonterías.

translation.en: Hey, what about homecoming?
Me? Who am I gonna ask?
What about Lera?
I'm just askin'. Just askin'.
translation.es: Yo te pregunto. Yo te pregunto.

translation.en: She doesn't want me. She avoids me.
translation.es: Ella no me quiere. Me está evitando.

translation.en: So I give her space.
Ya know? Thanks!
Yep! Well, "peace out."
I am copying your sign for that!
Hey, shut up! Blow out the candles!
Do you want to get some ice cream here?
Are you gonna pay? Oh, am I paying for you?
I'm broke.
I'm just teasing you.
I'm just curious, what's goin' on with us?
What are we?
I don't know. Are we together, or we not? I don't know.
translation.es: No sé. ¿Estamos juntos o no? No sé.

translation.en: I'm a little scared.
We have a lot going on.
Are we together?
I'm trying not to cry. This is my youngest son.
translation.es: Intento no llorar. Él es mi hijo menor.

translation.en: -Amen! -This is Amaree.
Amen!
Amaree used to come when he was a baby, and I'm just glad to have him here.
translation.es: Amaree venía cuando era bebé, y me alegra tenerlo aquí.

translation.en: This is the first time he's been here probably since he was about seven years old.
translation.es: Es la primera vez que viene desde que tenía siete años.

translation.en: And I always tell people, "This is my inspiration in life."
translation.es: Y siempre digo: "Él es mi inspiración en la vida".

translation.en: -Amen. -Amen.
He is the one in life that inspires me, amen.
translation.es: Él es quien me inspira, amén.

translation.en: And I just thank God for him being here today.
translation.es: Y le agradezco a Dios que hoy esté aquí.

translation.en: -Amen! -Amen.
Thank you for coming up.
Amen.
I would say that their relationship is… growing.
translation.es: Diría que su relación está… avanzando.

translation.en: I don't believe that they are at the father-son point
translation.es: No creo que esa relación haya llegado aún

translation.en: that they should be, at this time in his life, but they're working on it.
translation.es: al punto que él necesita en este momento, pero se esfuerzan, en especial Marvin.

translation.en: I can truly say that Marvin's working on it.
translation.es: pero se esfuerzan, en especial Marvin.

translation.en: I had a strong throw.
You were a receiver?
-W-R. -Oh, you were a wide receiver?
What happened?
Not now. That was way, way back then. Way back.
translation.es: Ahora no. Fue hace mucho tiempo.

translation.en: Right, back in the day.
I was good!
-Oh, really? -I was good.
Could you catch the ball with only one hand?
translation.es: ¿Podías atrapar la pelota con una mano?

translation.en: When I was growing up without Dad,
he left, and I was kind of disgusted with him.
translation.es: Se fue, y me enfadé mucho con él.

translation.en: It's tough.
It's difficult, and my role model was gone.
translation.es: Es difícil, y mi modelo a seguir no estaba.

translation.en: But now I feel like I'm connecting with Dad.
translation.es: Pero ahora siento que conecto con mi padre.

translation.en: First down. Yeah.
I just always want to be able to show him
that whatever differences
he feels in my world,
I'm willing to go and experience those same differences in his world.
translation.es: Estoy dispuesto a experimentarlas en su mundo.

translation.en: So, tomorrow is our homecoming game and our homecoming day.
translation.es: Mañana es nuestro partido de bienvenida.

translation.en: It's homecoming. We're expecting a big crowd.
translation.es: Es el de bienvenida. Esperamos a mucha gente.

translation.en: We're playing the Virginia Spartans.
The Virginia Spartans are a hearing team.
translation.es: Los Virginia Spartans son un equipo de oyentes.

translation.en: It's my very last game.
I'm going to be very emotional about it.
You ready? Ready? The big announcement.
The homecoming king goes to…
translation.es: El rey del baile de bienvenida es…

translation.en: Amaree McKenstry!
You know, any success is for Teddy.
translation.es: Todas las victorias son para Teddy.

translation.en: When we win, we win for Teddy.
We keep him in our hearts.
It is a football game. You are guys playing football.
translation.es: Es un partido de fútbol. Ustedes juegan al fútbol.

translation.en: They are guys playing football.
They're football players, and they're here to win today.
translation.es: Son jugadores de fútbol y vienen a ganar.

translation.en: You're gonna have to forget that they're Deaf.
translation.es: Tendrán que olvidar que son sordos.

translation.en: They will use that as a strength.
translation.es: O ellos lo usarán como ventaja.

translation.en: Don't let up! Let's come back stronger, together!
translation.es: ¡No se den por vencidos! ¡Volvamos fuertes y unidos!

translation.en: So don't give up! Don't give up! Come on!
I think their biggest challenge is going to be coming out of this bubble.
translation.es: Creo que su mayor desafío será salir de esta burbuja.

translation.en: Once they get out there, it's not a guarantee.
translation.es: Una vez que salgan, no habrá garantía.

translation.en: So there are going to be a lot of obstacles for them to face
that they haven't faced here on campus.
translation.es: que no han enfrentado en el campus.

translation.en: Life is short, you know…
anything can happen at any time.
Just be who you want to be and be yourself,
translation.es: Debes ser quien tú quieras ser,

translation.en: and that's all it needs to be.
Be yourself, you know?
You know, I'll be 18 soon.
I'll be graduating and I'm going out into the real world.
translation.es: Me graduaré y saldré al mundo real.

translation.en: I need to be prepared for that.
And what scares me
translation.es: Y lo que me da miedo

translation.en: is the unknown.
Things that can get fucked up.
translation.es: Las cosas que pueden salir mal.

translation.en: Those challenges, you know,
when I'm out in the world,
help me learn.
And I'm ready for the world.
translation.es: Y estoy listo para el mundo.

translation.en: I LOVE YOU.
